text:
For those writing about podcasts/podcasting and who are using affiliate marketing in your strategy: Plink, a podcast smart linking service, recently opened applications for affiliate program (_35% commissions on paid link upgrades_).

<https://plinkhq.com/affiliates/> do it up!

attachments.title: Plink Podcast Links Affiliate Program - Signup and Terms - Plink
attachments.text: Plink Affiliate Program. Signup to earn commission for sharing the podcast smart linking service. Plink makes smart links for creators. Send your audience to the right place, every time. Automatically open native apps that phones have pre-installed.
attachments.fallback: Plink Podcast Links Affiliate Program - Signup and Terms - Plink
